In the screenshot from the .txt file we can see that the error is "epp version is not 5.9.3.0" but in the database the version is 5.9.3.0

On Escalation Ticket # 00420500 the Following Fields have been updated: 
Status has been changed to Awaiting Client.

On Escalation Ticket # 00420500 the new comment has been added: Augustina Sidor:

In the remote session from 04th Nov., I tried to reapply the 5.9.4.0 patch, but without success.
I received the following error: SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 2006 MySql server has gone away.

During the updating process, the patch stops at the "Backing up all files and the database" step.
I checked the DB size, and it seems to be around 15 G.

I also checked the number of logs and I noticed that even though the partitions were activated, they were not created.
cf_logs ~ 5 mil. of logs
olog ~ 1.5 mil of logs
ofiletrace - contains 3 or 4 partitions

I tried to run manually the partiton.php script, and it was stoped by the following error:  HY000 Lost connection to MYSQL server during query


I logged into MySql and ran the same SQL command and I received the same error.

I enabled the MySQL logs but nothing helpful was logged. (please see the attachments)
I also checked the MySQL config file. (screenshots attached )

@Cristian-Alexandru Halmajan could you please ask someone from the devops teams for some advice? 

Thanks,
Augustina

[DevOps CommentId:11171535]

On Escalation Ticket # 00420500 the new comment has been added: Cătălin Stoian:

We have tried to recover the database by removing ib_logfile* from /var/eppfiles/mysql as well as by trying different options for innodb_force_recovery. As long as I was inside the connection nothing worked. Daniel was advised to use also other values for innodb_force_recovery and if that didn't work, to use latest database from /var/eppfiles/backup/patches along with EPPServer files.

[DevOps CommentId:11195274]

On Escalation Ticket # 00420500 the new comment has been added: Hello,

After we restore the old database, we manage to update the EPP server to 5.9.4.0 

The case can be closed.
